inclusion.criterion: Ability to lay supine on an angiographic table
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Appropriate anesthesia risk as determined by certified anesthesia provider evaluation preprocedure.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing, able and mentally competent to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who have failed previous attempts at weight loss through diet, exercise, and behavior modification
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Major surgery within the past eight weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous gastric, pancreatic, hepatic and splenic surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous radiation therapy to the left or right upper quadrant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous gastric, hepatic, or splenic embolization
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any history of portal venous hypertension
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, associated with dark visual spot in right eye, right facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech. He denied dyspnea, headache, palpitations, chest pain, fever, dizziness, bowel or urinary incontinence, loss of consciousness.
